full_output.summary: A motivated and ambitious third-year student at Manipal University Jaipur, passionate about web development, data structures, algorithms, and machine learning. My computer science journey has given me a solid foundation in programming, front-end and back-end technologies, and problem-solving. Through projects and coursework, Ive developed skills in creating dynamic websites, efficient data manipulation, and applying machine learning techniques. I am eager to expand my knowledge and contribute to innovative web and machine learning solutions.

certifications.title: Web Development by Dr. Angela Yu
Machine Learning By Kirill Eremenko and Hadelin de Ponteves

projects.name: Sign Language Detection Using Convolutional Neural Networks
projects.description: Developed a robust sign language detection model Using Convolutional Neural Networks (CNNs).The model was trained using the Keras framework with TensorFlow backend, achieving significant accuracy in both training and validation phases.

projects.name: E-commerce Product Page
projects.description: Developed an interactive and responsive e-commerce product page using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. This project features an image carousel for product images, product variation selection (e.g., size, color), and a dynamic shopping cart that updates with selected items.

projects.name: Pet Adoption Management System
projects.description: Developed a comprehensive Pet Adoption Management System using SQL and PHP. This project involved designing and implementing a database to manage pet profiles, adoption processes, and user information. Key features include user registration, pet listing with search and filter capabilities, adoption application processing, and administrative functionalities for managing data and monitoring adoption status.

full_output.name: Krish Patel
